message.body: I'm afraid, there will be people who will start migrating to colder climates, and there will be people who live there and don't want other people to come.
ok, as long as you can survive, but that will be not the case in the future; http://time.com/4087092/climate-change-heat-wave/
maybe I should start learning how to build (literally) underground houses and grow fungus :)
